attributes.action: Stop outside interference in the UK political system.
attributes.additional_details: I believe our Democratic system is at threat.
attributes.background: Introduce Measures to stop outside interference in the UK political system, from potentially nefarious Person/Persons or Ltd Companies, Including potentially implementing change to who may make donations to Limited so called Political Paties.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Tighten the rules on political donations
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
